name: d0llywood1
description: '''Kimberly Sommers''' ({{Circa|2003}}), known professionally as '''d0llywood1''', is an American rapper, record producer and singer from [[Louisiana]] who gained virality online in the digicore scene. She would release her second mixtape ''This Is Just a Dream (and Soon I Will Awake)'' (2024), and later co-headline an American tour with [[Jane Remover]].
